##################################################################################%%00010import matplotlib.ticker as ticker%%00010import re%%00010import numpy%%00010%%00010from pylab import *%%00010rcParams['figure.figsize'] = 11, 4%%00010%%00010METRIC = re.sub(r'[^a-zA-Z0-9\s]', '', kIn['Metric'][0])%%00010%%00010systems = [ k for k in kIn.keys() if k != 'Metric' ]%%00010%%00010%%00010data = [ kIn[s] for s in systems ]%%00010%%00010fig, ax = plt.subplots()%%00010ax.boxplot(data)%%00010%%00010#title('Comparison of different systems using metric: ' + METRIC)%%00010ylabel('Factor relative to the Reactive system\n(lower is better)')%%00010%%00010TOP = 1.2%%00010ylim(0, TOP)%%00010%%00010grid(True, linestyle='-', which='major', color='lightgrey', alpha=0.5)%%00010%%00010systems.insert(0, '')%%00010numBoxes = len(systems)%%00010%%00010pos = np.arange(numBoxes)+1%%00010for tick,label in zip(range(numBoxes),ax.get_xticklabels()):%%00010 ax.text(pos[tick], TOP-(TOP*0.04), "%.2f" % mean(data[tick]),%%00010 ha='center', va='top', rotation='vertical', size='x-small',%%00010 color='r', weight='bold')%%00010%%00010xticks(range(len(systems)), systems,%%00010 fontsize='small',%%00010 rotation=90,%%00010 ha='center', va='top' )%%00010%%00010ax.yaxis.set_major_formatter(ticker.FormatStrFormatter('%.1fx'))%%00010ax.set_axisbelow(True)%%00010%%00010imgname = "out-systems-boxplot-" + METRIC%%00010%%00010savefig(imgname + ".png", format='png', bbox_inches='tight')%%00010savefig(imgname + ".pdf", format='pdf', bbox_inches='tight')
